title: Explaining Test Results
description: Delivering normal test results to a worried patient
context: A 45-year-old patient has been waiting anxiously for their blood test results after experiencing some chest pain last week. The results are normal, but the patient has been very worried about having a heart attack. They're sitting on the edge of their seat, looking tense and ready to hear bad news.
key_points: Deliver good news clearly and early
Explain what the tests checked for
Address their specific concerns about heart health
Use simple language to explain normal values
